title: WELCOME
subtitle: Your profile & bookings

details.subscriptionPolicy:
SUBSCRIPTION MODIFICATION

subscribers may upgrade their plan at any time, even from the first month.

To switch to a lower plan, the request can only be made after minimum 3-month commitment, with effect from the following month.



subscription cancellation

subscription require a minimum commitment of 6 months.

Cancellation can be requested at any time after that period, with 1 month's notice.

the subscription will remain active until the end of the month following the request.

noBookedClasses: You have no upcoming classes booked
bookingInfo:
useful info

you can cancel a class up to 24 hours before the session starts, and up to 12 hours for members.

if you're on the waitlist, you'll be notified by email as soon as a spot becomes available.

for any questions, contact us at: starlette.tlv@gmail.com
classpackInfo:
useful info

class pack are valid for limited time. make sure to use your sessions before the expiration date.

unused classes after expiration date will be lost.

to purchase a new pack, visit the the pricing page
